== Bio ==
Thomas H. Rod has been involved with the design and planning of the ESS
Data Management and Software Centre for the last four years. He
initially got involved via a Danish in kind contribution to the ESS
lead by University of Copenhagen but has for the last year been a member
of the ESS staff where he currently is the Group Leader for Data
Analysis and Modelling. Thomas' background is in scientific software
development and computer simulations and modelling of materials where he
has had an active career in both academia and industry in Denmark.
